plot: Bart ends up at a school for gifted children after cheating on an IQ test.

Bart is fearing that he will fail an intelligence test, Bart switches exams with Martin Prince. When school psychologist Dr. Pryor studies the results, he thinks that Bart is a genius, and Bart is enrolled into a new school for genius kids. Bart doesn't fit in very well though.—TnMovieFan2@aol.com

Bart is afraid that he won't pass his IQ test, and he doesn't know what to do. But when the teacher leaves brainy Martin's test on her desk, Bart has the chance to use it and cheat. Meanwhile, when he receives his test results back, he passes it which makes his teacher, principal, and parents amazed, making them think he's a genius. A psychologist tells Bart he can go to a school where kids have a unique and special skill of learning. When Bart accepts, he doesn't know what he should do because he knows he's not smart.

After being scolded by Principal Skinner for graffitiing the school wall, Bart cheats on an IQ test and is sent to a school for gifted children. He gets much closer to his father, however he quickly realises that he can't keep up with academic children of the school, and his old friends begin to reject him for his 'genius brain'.
